publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1650# Linda Fabiani: National Police Memorial—That the Parliament welcomes the unveiling on 7 September 2004 of a national memorial, sited at the Scottish Police College at Tulliallan, to all Scottish police officers who have lost their lives in the line of duty; recognises that giving one’s life in the line of duty is a sacrifice which very few people in our society ever have to face, but one that is faced by our police officers on a daily basis, and acknowledges that sacrifice and recognises the loss suffered by the families of police officers.
S2M-1650# National Police Memorial (lodged on 6 September 2004) Michael Matheson*, Donald Gorrie*

S2M-1650# Linda Fabiani: National Police Memorial—That the Parliament welcomes the unveiling on 7 September 2004 of a national memorial, sited at the Scottish Police College at Tulliallan, to all Scottish police officers who have lost their lives in the line of duty; recognises that giving one’s life in the line of duty is a sacrifice which very few people in our society ever have to face, but one that is faced by our police officers on a daily basis, and acknowledges that sacrifice and recognises the loss suffered by the families of police officers. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Donald Gorrie
S2M-1650# National Police Memorial (lodged on 6 September 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1650# National Police Memorial (lodged on 6 September 2004) Phil Gallie*

S2M-1650# National Police Memorial (lodged on 6 September 2004) Jackie Baillie*, Johann Lamont*, Rosie Kane*, Campbell Martin*, Murray Tosh*, Margaret Jamieson*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Patrick Harvie*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Eleanor Scott*, Fergus Ewing*, Mark Ballard*, Alex Neil*, Christine Grahame*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mr David Davidson*, Tricia Marwick*, Murdo Fraser*, Shiona Baird*, Bristow Muldoon*, Bill Butler*, Margaret Mitchell*, Mr Brian Monteith*

S2M-1650# National Police Memorial (lodged on 6 September 2004) Chris Ballance*, Mike Pringle*, Scott Barrie*, Margaret Smith*, Kate Maclean*, Karen Whitefield*, Robert Brown*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S2M-1650# National Police Memorial (lodged on 6 September 2004) Elaine Smith*, Robin Harper*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Brian Adam*
S2M-1650# National Police Memorial (lodged on 6 September 2004) Ms Sandra White*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
